Teltoli hisses and crouches down, her small form making it easy to 
dodge the bullets, but one stray one caught her in the tail. She 
brought up her gun and fired off three shots of her missles at him, 
so anyway he dodged he would still be hit. While moving her wrist, 
she accidently pushed something and a small reloadable dart came out, 
set on a small launcher. She looked at it and shrugged, setting one 
to fire at GodFather, so it joined her other blasts.

(The dart she just discovered is actually a fast working posion)
